scripts.hasura-metadata-apply: hasura metadata apply && hasura metadata reload
scripts.hasura-create-required-seed: hasura seed create required_seed --database-name transl --from-table languages
scripts.hasura-create-develop-seed: hasura seed create develop_seed --database-name transl --from-table companies --from-table company_user_link --from-table project_language --from-table project_terms --from-table projects --from-table translation_statuses --from-table translations --from-table user_project_link --from-table users
